name: Sable Maze: Sullivan River - A Mystery Hidden Object Adventure (Full)
name_original: Sable Maze: Sullivan River - A Mystery Hidden Object Adventure (Full)
description:
Unlock the complete adventure with a single purchase! No in-app purchases!

You wake up to the same nightmare every night of children lost in a maze, crying out for help. With the suggestion of your therapist, you decide to return to where it all began. Beware, it isn’t at all that it seems!

• REDISCOVER THE SULLIVAN RIVER SUMMER CAMP
You’ve made your way back to the infamous camp and must uncover what happened during that long-forgotten summer. Proceed with caution, others may be watching!

• CAN YOU REVEAL THE SECRET OF THE ANCIENT LABYRINTH?
Get closer to the truth by searching through immersive hidden object scenes and find out what really happened to your camp mates.

• HELP RELEASE THE SOULS OF MISSING CHILDREN
Collect the tools you need to save the children by playing entertaining mini-games and clever puzzles.

• CONTINUE INVESTIGATING IN THE BONUS CHAPTER
Someone else needs your help! Find out who in the bonus game and enjoy additional Collector’s Edition exclusives including an integrated strategy guide!
